revised_title: Matrix Elements of Non-Central Forces in Nuclear Structure
tldr: The authors derived formulas for the matrix elements of non-central forces in nuclear structure, specifically focusing on the -shell. They discussed the evaluation of two-particle elements and applied their findings to the -shell, considering central, tensor, and spin-orbit forces. The study aimed to derive the spins and moment data of certain -shell nuclei from a two-body charge-symmetric interaction containing central, tensor, and spin-orbit forces.
